Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.key.util

Class DynamicKeyUtils

java.lang.Object
com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.key.util.DynamicKeyUtils
public class DynamicKeyUtils extends Object
Helper class to perform key related operations.

    • isMatches

      public static boolean isMatches(@Nullable Context context, @Nullable String targetPackage)
      Matches the signature of two packages.
      Parameters:
      context - The context to get the package manager.
      targetPackage - The package to be matched.
      Returns:
      true if the signature of two packages match.
      See Also:
      • PackageManager.checkSignatures(String, String)
      • PackageManager.SIGNATURE_MATCH

    • isMatches

      public static boolean isMatches(@Nullable Context context, @Nullable String... packages)
      Checks whether the signature matches for at least one of the supplied packages.
      Parameters:
      context - The context to be used.
      packages - The key packages to be matched.
      Returns:
      true if the signature matches for at least one of the supplied packages.

      Launch a package according to the default launch intent.
      Parameters:

      targetPackage - The package to be launched.
      Returns:
      true if the package was launched successfully.

    • broadcast

      public static void broadcast(@Nullable Context context, @Nullable String keyPackage, @Nullable String action)
      Broadcast the key action to the supported apps.
      Parameters:
      context - The context to broadcast the key action.
      keyPackage - The name of the key package.
      action - The intent action to be broadcast.

    • rateAppOrKey

      public static boolean rateAppOrKey(@Nullable Context context, boolean isKey, @Nullable String keyPackage)
      Rate the app or key (if installed) on the Google Play.
      Parameters:
      context - The context to get the package name.
      isKey - true if the key package is installed.
      keyPackage - The key package to be rated.
      Returns:
      true on successful operation.
      See Also:
      • DynamicLinkUtils.rateApp(Context)
      • DynamicLinkUtils.viewInGooglePlay(Context, String)

    • checkWithBase

      public static int checkWithBase(@Nullable Context context, @Nullable String base, boolean debug, @Nullable String... packages)
      Checks whether the signature matches for at least one of the supplied packages and sets the shared preferences accordingly.
      Parameters:
      context - The context to be used.
      base - The optional base key to be used.
      debug - true if running in debug mode.
      packages - The key packages to be matched.
      Returns:
      The key status according to the installed packages.

    • check

      public static int check(@Nullable Context context, boolean debug, @Nullable String... packages)
      Checks whether the signature matches for at least one of the supplied packages and sets the shared preferences accordingly.
      Parameters:
      context - The context to be used.
      debug - true if running in debug mode.
      packages - The key packages to be matched.
      Returns:
      The key status according to the installed packages.
